cn.description:
MagicKit AI – 全能设备与实用工具包

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的实用工具应用，旨在帮助您监控设备状态、优化性能，并从一个便捷界面访问日常工具。专为 iOS 打造，MagicKit AI 集合了多种核心功能，同时保护您的隐私并节省电池。

设备与系统工具：
• 电池状态：查看当前电量和充电状态

网络工具：
• 网速测试：测量您的互联网连接速度
• Wi-Fi 信息：查看网络名称、IP 地址和连接状态

实用工具：

• 日期时间计算器：支持工作日差值计算

• Magic 计数器：多项目统计追踪，含连续天数与数据统计

• 兼容所有 iOS 设备

适用人群：

cn.description:
管理食谱，创建购物清单，膳食计划，从你最喜爱的网站下载食谱，无缝同步到所有设备。

应用特色

• 食谱 - 从你最喜爱的网站下载食谱，或添加你自己的食谱。
• 购物清单 - 创建智能购物清单，自动合并食材，并按过道分类。
• 食品储藏室 - 使用食品储藏室来跟踪已有的食材以及到期日期。
• 膳食计划 - 使用每日、每周或每月日历计划膳食。
• 菜单 - 保存你最喜爱的膳食计划，方便重复使用。
• 同步 - 在所有设备之间同步食谱、购物清单和膳食计划。

• 调整 - 将食材份量调整到所需份量，轻松转换度量单位。
• 烹饪 - 在烹饪过程中保持屏幕开启，去掉食材部分，突出显示当前步骤。
• 搜索 - 将食谱分类并细分。按名称、食材等搜索。
• 定时器 - 自动从烹饪说明中检测烹饪时间，点一点即可启动计时器。

• 导入 - 从现有应用（如MacGourmet、YummySoup!、MasterCook和Living Cookbook等）导入食谱。
• 导出 - 把膳食计划导出到日历，并将购物清单导出到提醒。
• 分享 - 通过AirDrop或电子邮件分享食谱。
• 打印 - 打印食谱、购物清单、菜单和膳食计划。食谱支持多种打印格式，包括索引卡片。

• 扩展 - 直接在Safari中保存食谱，查看当天的膳食计划。
• 书签 - 从任意浏览器直接下载食谱到你的Paprika云同步帐户。
• 离线访问 - 所有数据都存储在本地。无需联网就可以查看食谱。

3.0版有哪些新功能

• 支持iPhone X和iOS 11。
• 通用iOS应用。
• 支持iPad上的多任务功能。
• 为每个食谱添加全尺寸多图。在说明中嵌入照片。
• 在食材或说明中插入其他食谱或网站的链接。
• 在食谱中使用粗体和斜体格式。
• 在标准制和公制之间转换度量单位。
• 在多个类别之间搜索食谱。
• 将自定义过道添加到购物清单，并以你的偏好顺序重新排序。
• 创建多个购物清单。
• 为食品储藏室添加自定义食材。跟踪数量、购买日期和到期日期。
• 在食品室和购物清单之间转移物品。
• 为膳食计划添加自定义膳食类型。
• 创建跨越多天、可重复使用的菜单。

hk.releaseNotes:
Mayor Card 1.0.6 – Your Feedback Matters!
• A new player feedback screen has been added.
• Minor technical improvements for a smoother experience.
• With new balance adjustments, your town is now fairer and more fun!
hk.description:
RULE YOUR TOWN, BUILD YOUR CITY, BALANCE YOUR RESOURCES!
Swipe each card with one finger, become mayor, make bold decisions, please your people and carve your own reign into history!

Mayor Card fuses classic city-management simulation with lightning-fast swipe-card action to create a fresh strategy deck-builder. Drag every card left or right; collect taxes, protect nature, grow population and keep every resource bar alive. Let any gauge hit zero and you’re out of office—maintain the balance, win, and unlock new cards to build an even greater city.

KEY FEATURES

• 740 Unique Cards - 740 unique choices—every decision is yours!
• Swipe & Decide – Instant control, deep consequence.
• Triple Balance System – People, economy & nature; set tax rates, raise funds, stay green.
• Chain Cards – Risk-reward event chains; one move shapes the future.
• Adventure Cards – Call-Progress-Outcome stories; every deck hides new town legends.
• Character Stories – Treasure Hunter, Chef, Thief… each NPC steers you to a different ending.
• Endless Replayability – Random decks, alternate finales: every management term feels new.


LAUNCH DISCOUNT — NOW LIVE!
Limited-time offer for early mayors: swipe cards, grow your city, expand your town and rise as a legendary city leader. Download, govern and win today!

这是一款沉浸于尼斯大陆史前史诗的冒险 MMORPG。远古之时，尼斯大陆本是完整陆块，一场剧烈的火山爆发将其分裂为萨伊纳斯、加鲁迦与吉鲁岛三大群岛，各岛气候迥异、地貌万千 —— 萨伊纳斯的温和村落、加鲁迦的热带丛林、吉鲁岛的神秘秘境，构成了这片充满生机与未知的土地。这里的人类部落以图腾为信仰，与栖息在道具、武器中的精灵共生，精灵们赋予人们勇气与力量，守护着部落的安宁。然而，曾经高度发达的机械文明因过度消耗自然，引发了毁灭性危机，光明精灵王为拯救生灵，封印了机械遗迹与黑暗精灵王，将大陆命名为 “尼斯”，让人类回归原始与自然共生的状态。如今，封印之力渐弱，黑暗气息悄然蔓延，图腾黯淡、巨兽狂躁，散落的晶石背后藏着拯救大陆的秘密，作为部落通过成人仪式的勇者，你将带着族人的期盼，穿越群岛丛林、洞窟迷宫，唤醒精灵之力，寻找晶石，抵御黑暗侵袭，续写尼斯大陆的存续传奇。

【游戏特色】

「福利丰厚・多重奖励领不停」
轻松起步，多重福利直接拉满！全服通关共同目标解锁集体福利；区服专属挑战达成后，全员瓜分资源礼包；每日签到福利不重样，累计登录还能解锁丰富资源助力快速成长，零门槛享受冒险乐趣。

「挂机成长・无限冒险不费力」
挂机战斗模式，解放双手也能热血升级！无论是探索原始森林、挑战野外巨兽，还是刷取材料副本，只需一键设置阵容，角色与宠物便自动作战，离线期间依旧能持续收获经验。随着等级攀升，不仅能解锁更广阔的原始地图，还能积累足够资源解锁更强技能、培养宠物，轻松从新手成长为部落强者。

「宠物捕捉养成・属性策略随心搭」
原始大陆藏着上百种萌趣与强悍并存的宠物，野外探索即可免费捕捉，运气爆棚还能邂逅稀有品种；想要快速解锁强力伙伴，也能通过召唤获取传说级宠物。宠物系统兼具趣味与策略，元素克制搭配、资质定向培养、技能自由组合，既能打造输出猛将，也能养成团队守护，专属宠物战力由你定义。

「多元玩法・热血不单调」
告别单一挂机，多样玩法覆盖不同需求！竞技场实时匹配同战力玩家，比拼宠物阵容与策略搭配，登顶榜单赢取稀有资源；狩猎玩法集结队友猎杀远古巨兽，获取顶级装备打造材料；副本分为单人试炼与组队挑战，难度梯度分明，新手与老手皆能找到乐趣；跨服活动每周开启，与其他区服玩家同台竞技，争夺专属奖励，热血对抗永不落幕。
在游戏中，你能轻松领满福利、挂机惬意成长，捕捉养成专属宠物，解锁多元热血玩法，和家族伙伴一起，探索原始大陆的无尽精彩与未知惊喜。

hk.description:
--

獲獎：
● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選
● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎
● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

遊戲特色：
● 地城+解謎+倉庫番
● 150 個精心設計的關卡
● 地城氛圍的像素美術
● 非線性地城地圖

这是一款沉浸于尼斯大陆史前史诗的冒险 MMORPG。远古之时，尼斯大陆本是完整陆块，一场剧烈的火山爆发将其分裂为萨伊纳斯、加鲁迦与吉鲁岛三大群岛，各岛气候迥异、地貌万千 —— 萨伊纳斯的温和村落、加鲁迦的热带丛林、吉鲁岛的神秘秘境，构成了这片充满生机与未知的土地。这里的人类部落以图腾为信仰，与栖息在道具、武器中的精灵共生，精灵们赋予人们勇气与力量，守护着部落的安宁。然而，曾经高度发达的机械文明因过度消耗自然，引发了毁灭性危机，光明精灵王为拯救生灵，封印了机械遗迹与黑暗精灵王，将大陆命名为 “尼斯”，让人类回归原始与自然共生的状态。如今，封印之力渐弱，黑暗气息悄然蔓延，图腾黯淡、巨兽狂躁，散落的晶石背后藏着拯救大陆的秘密，作为部落通过成人仪式的勇者，你将带着族人的期盼，穿越群岛丛林、洞窟迷宫，唤醒精灵之力，寻找晶石，抵御黑暗侵袭，续写尼斯大陆的存续传奇。

【游戏特色】

「福利丰厚・多重奖励领不停」
轻松起步，多重福利直接拉满！全服通关共同目标解锁集体福利；区服专属挑战达成后，全员瓜分资源礼包；每日签到福利不重样，累计登录还能解锁丰富资源助力快速成长，零门槛享受冒险乐趣。

「挂机成长・无限冒险不费力」
挂机战斗模式，解放双手也能热血升级！无论是探索原始森林、挑战野外巨兽，还是刷取材料副本，只需一键设置阵容，角色与宠物便自动作战，离线期间依旧能持续收获经验。随着等级攀升，不仅能解锁更广阔的原始地图，还能积累足够资源解锁更强技能、培养宠物，轻松从新手成长为部落强者。

「宠物捕捉养成・属性策略随心搭」
原始大陆藏着上百种萌趣与强悍并存的宠物，野外探索即可免费捕捉，运气爆棚还能邂逅稀有品种；想要快速解锁强力伙伴，也能通过召唤获取传说级宠物。宠物系统兼具趣味与策略，元素克制搭配、资质定向培养、技能自由组合，既能打造输出猛将，也能养成团队守护，专属宠物战力由你定义。

「多元玩法・热血不单调」
告别单一挂机，多样玩法覆盖不同需求！竞技场实时匹配同战力玩家，比拼宠物阵容与策略搭配，登顶榜单赢取稀有资源；狩猎玩法集结队友猎杀远古巨兽，获取顶级装备打造材料；副本分为单人试炼与组队挑战，难度梯度分明，新手与老手皆能找到乐趣；跨服活动每周开启，与其他区服玩家同台竞技，争夺专属奖励，热血对抗永不落幕。
在游戏中，你能轻松领满福利、挂机惬意成长，捕捉养成专属宠物，解锁多元热血玩法，和家族伙伴一起，探索原始大陆的无尽精彩与未知惊喜。

• Improved Graphics: Enjoy smoother visuals and a more polished look.
• New Doodle Characters: Build your team with fresh, quirky doodle players.
• New Bowling Styles: Try out exciting new ways to pitch and play.

Update now and step up to the plate with the best version yet!
hk.description:
Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you’re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more!

Key Features:

Baseball Action Like Never Before:
Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter’s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun!

Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay:
Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops!

Collectible Doodle Characters:
Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments.

Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun:
Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action!

Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound:
Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run.

Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure.

Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

hk.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

hk.description:
Organize your recipes. Create grocery lists. Plan your meals. Download recipes from your favorite websites. Seamlessly sync to all your devices.

Features

• Recipes - Download recipes from your favorite websites, or add your own.
• Grocery Lists - Create smart grocery lists that automatically combine ingredients and sort them by aisle.
• Pantry - Use the pantry to keep track of which ingredients you have and when they expire.
• Meal Planner - Plan your meals using our daily, weekly, or monthly calendars.
• Menus - Save your favorite meal plans as reusable menus.
• Sync - Keep your recipes, grocery lists, and meal plans synced between all your devices.

• Adjust - Scale ingredients to your desired serving size, and convert between measurements.
• Cook - Keep the screen on while cooking, cross off ingredients, and highlight your current step.
• Search - Organize your recipes into categories and subcategories. Search by name, ingredient, and more.
• Timers - Cook times are automatically detected in your directions. Simply tap on one to start a timer.

• Import - Import from existing apps such as MacGourmet, YummySoup!, MasterCook & Living Cookbook.
• Export - Export your meal plans to Calendar and your grocery lists to Reminders.
• Share - Share recipes via AirDrop or email.
• Print - Print recipes, grocery lists, menus, and meal plans. Recipes support multiple print formats including index cards.

• Extensions - Save recipes directly in Safari and view today's scheduled meals.
• Bookmarklet - Download recipes from any browser straight into your Paprika Cloud Sync account.
• Offline Access - All of your data is stored locally. No internet connection is required to view your recipes.

What's New in 3.0

• iPhone X and iOS 11 support. 
• iOS app is now universal.
• Multitasking support on iPad.
• Add multiple, full-sized photos to each recipe. Embed photos in your directions.
• Insert links to other recipes or websites in your ingredients or directions.
• Format recipes using bold and italics.
• Convert ingredient measurements between standard and metric.
• Search for recipes across multiple categories.
• Add custom aisles to your grocery list and re-arrange them in your preferred order.
• Create multiple grocery lists.
• Add custom ingredients to the pantry. Track quantities, purchase dates, and expiration dates.
• Move items back and forth between the pantry and grocery list.
• Add custom meal types to the meal planner.
• Create reusable menus that span multiple days.

Platforms

Paprika is available on multiple platforms so you can access it on all of your devices. Please note that each version is sold separately.

mo.description:
RULE YOUR TOWN, BUILD YOUR CITY, BALANCE YOUR RESOURCES!
Swipe each card with one finger, become mayor, make bold decisions, please your people and carve your own reign into history!

Mayor Card fuses classic city-management simulation with lightning-fast swipe-card action to create a fresh strategy deck-builder. Drag every card left or right; collect taxes, protect nature, grow population and keep every resource bar alive. Let any gauge hit zero and you’re out of office—maintain the balance, win, and unlock new cards to build an even greater city.

KEY FEATURES

• 740 Unique Cards - 740 unique choices—every decision is yours!
• Swipe & Decide – Instant control, deep consequence.
• Triple Balance System – People, economy & nature; set tax rates, raise funds, stay green.
• Chain Cards – Risk-reward event chains; one move shapes the future.
• Adventure Cards – Call-Progress-Outcome stories; every deck hides new town legends.
• Character Stories – Treasure Hunter, Chef, Thief… each NPC steers you to a different ending.
• Endless Replayability – Random decks, alternate finales: every management term feels new.


LAUNCH DISCOUNT — NOW LIVE!
Limited-time offer for early mayors: swipe cards, grow your city, expand your town and rise as a legendary city leader. Download, govern and win today!

mo.description:
--

獲獎：
● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選
● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎
● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

遊戲特色：
● 地城+解謎+倉庫番
● 150 個精心設計的關卡
● 地城氛圍的像素美術
● 非線性地城地圖

--

mo.description:
MagicKit AI – 全方位裝置與工具箱

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的實用工具應用程式，專為 iOS 設計，幫助您監控裝置狀態、優化效能，並透過單一介面輕鬆使用日常工具。功能齊全，兼顧隱私與電池續航。

裝置與系統工具：
• 電池狀態：查看目前電量與充電情況
• 儲存空間使用：分析已用與可用空間

• 開機時間追蹤：監控裝置開機持續時間

網路工具：
• 網速測試：測量網路連線速度
• Wi-Fi 資訊：查看網路名稱、IP 位址與連線狀態
• IP 查詢：查看公網 IP 的地理位置資訊

實用工具：
• 單位換算器：支援各類單位轉換
• 貨幣換算器：即時匯率與幣值轉換

• 輕巧省電
• 支援所有 iOS 裝置
• 持續新增工具與更新
• 重視隱私與效能

適用族群：
• 裝置監控與效能優化
• 日常測量與轉換任務

• 相片清理與空間管理

• 追蹤習慣與統計進度
• 快速使用工具如手電筒與亮度調整

立即下載 MagicKit AI，使用一款智慧又強大的工具箱，簡化您的日常工作與生活！

这是一款沉浸于尼斯大陆史前史诗的冒险 MMORPG。远古之时，尼斯大陆本是完整陆块，一场剧烈的火山爆发将其分裂为萨伊纳斯、加鲁迦与吉鲁岛三大群岛，各岛气候迥异、地貌万千 —— 萨伊纳斯的温和村落、加鲁迦的热带丛林、吉鲁岛的神秘秘境，构成了这片充满生机与未知的土地。这里的人类部落以图腾为信仰，与栖息在道具、武器中的精灵共生，精灵们赋予人们勇气与力量，守护着部落的安宁。然而，曾经高度发达的机械文明因过度消耗自然，引发了毁灭性危机，光明精灵王为拯救生灵，封印了机械遗迹与黑暗精灵王，将大陆命名为 “尼斯”，让人类回归原始与自然共生的状态。如今，封印之力渐弱，黑暗气息悄然蔓延，图腾黯淡、巨兽狂躁，散落的晶石背后藏着拯救大陆的秘密，作为部落通过成人仪式的勇者，你将带着族人的期盼，穿越群岛丛林、洞窟迷宫，唤醒精灵之力，寻找晶石，抵御黑暗侵袭，续写尼斯大陆的存续传奇。

【游戏特色】

「福利丰厚・多重奖励领不停」
轻松起步，多重福利直接拉满！全服通关共同目标解锁集体福利；区服专属挑战达成后，全员瓜分资源礼包；每日签到福利不重样，累计登录还能解锁丰富资源助力快速成长，零门槛享受冒险乐趣。

「挂机成长・无限冒险不费力」
挂机战斗模式，解放双手也能热血升级！无论是探索原始森林、挑战野外巨兽，还是刷取材料副本，只需一键设置阵容，角色与宠物便自动作战，离线期间依旧能持续收获经验。随着等级攀升，不仅能解锁更广阔的原始地图，还能积累足够资源解锁更强技能、培养宠物，轻松从新手成长为部落强者。

「宠物捕捉养成・属性策略随心搭」
原始大陆藏着上百种萌趣与强悍并存的宠物，野外探索即可免费捕捉，运气爆棚还能邂逅稀有品种；想要快速解锁强力伙伴，也能通过召唤获取传说级宠物。宠物系统兼具趣味与策略，元素克制搭配、资质定向培养、技能自由组合，既能打造输出猛将，也能养成团队守护，专属宠物战力由你定义。

「多元玩法・热血不单调」
告别单一挂机，多样玩法覆盖不同需求！竞技场实时匹配同战力玩家，比拼宠物阵容与策略搭配，登顶榜单赢取稀有资源；狩猎玩法集结队友猎杀远古巨兽，获取顶级装备打造材料；副本分为单人试炼与组队挑战，难度梯度分明，新手与老手皆能找到乐趣；跨服活动每周开启，与其他区服玩家同台竞技，争夺专属奖励，热血对抗永不落幕。
在游戏中，你能轻松领满福利、挂机惬意成长，捕捉养成专属宠物，解锁多元热血玩法，和家族伙伴一起，探索原始大陆的无尽精彩与未知惊喜。

mo.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

mo.description:
Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you’re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more!

Key Features:

Baseball Action Like Never Before:
Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter’s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun!

Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay:
Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops!

Collectible Doodle Characters:
Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments.

Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun:
Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action!

Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound:
Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run.

Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure.

Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

mo.description:
Organize your recipes. Create grocery lists. Plan your meals. Download recipes from your favorite websites. Seamlessly sync to all your devices.

Features

• Recipes - Download recipes from your favorite websites, or add your own.
• Grocery Lists - Create smart grocery lists that automatically combine ingredients and sort them by aisle.
• Pantry - Use the pantry to keep track of which ingredients you have and when they expire.
• Meal Planner - Plan your meals using our daily, weekly, or monthly calendars.
• Menus - Save your favorite meal plans as reusable menus.
• Sync - Keep your recipes, grocery lists, and meal plans synced between all your devices.

• Adjust - Scale ingredients to your desired serving size, and convert between measurements.
• Cook - Keep the screen on while cooking, cross off ingredients, and highlight your current step.
• Search - Organize your recipes into categories and subcategories. Search by name, ingredient, and more.
• Timers - Cook times are automatically detected in your directions. Simply tap on one to start a timer.

• Import - Import from existing apps such as MacGourmet, YummySoup!, MasterCook & Living Cookbook.
• Export - Export your meal plans to Calendar and your grocery lists to Reminders.
• Share - Share recipes via AirDrop or email.
• Print - Print recipes, grocery lists, menus, and meal plans. Recipes support multiple print formats including index cards.

• Extensions - Save recipes directly in Safari and view today's scheduled meals.
• Bookmarklet - Download recipes from any browser straight into your Paprika Cloud Sync account.
• Offline Access - All of your data is stored locally. No internet connection is required to view your recipes.

What's New in 3.0

• iPhone X and iOS 11 support. 
• iOS app is now universal.
• Multitasking support on iPad.
• Add multiple, full-sized photos to each recipe. Embed photos in your directions.
• Insert links to other recipes or websites in your ingredients or directions.
• Format recipes using bold and italics.
• Convert ingredient measurements between standard and metric.
• Search for recipes across multiple categories.
• Add custom aisles to your grocery list and re-arrange them in your preferred order.
• Create multiple grocery lists.
• Add custom ingredients to the pantry. Track quantities, purchase dates, and expiration dates.
• Move items back and forth between the pantry and grocery list.
• Add custom meal types to the meal planner.
• Create reusable menus that span multiple days.

Platforms

Paprika is available on multiple platforms so you can access it on all of your devices. Please note that each version is sold separately.

tw.description:
RULE YOUR TOWN, BUILD YOUR CITY, BALANCE YOUR RESOURCES!
Swipe each card with one finger, become mayor, make bold decisions, please your people and carve your own reign into history!

Mayor Card fuses classic city-management simulation with lightning-fast swipe-card action to create a fresh strategy deck-builder. Drag every card left or right; collect taxes, protect nature, grow population and keep every resource bar alive. Let any gauge hit zero and you’re out of office—maintain the balance, win, and unlock new cards to build an even greater city.

KEY FEATURES

• 740 Unique Cards - 740 unique choices—every decision is yours!
• Swipe & Decide – Instant control, deep consequence.
• Triple Balance System – People, economy & nature; set tax rates, raise funds, stay green.
• Chain Cards – Risk-reward event chains; one move shapes the future.
• Adventure Cards – Call-Progress-Outcome stories; every deck hides new town legends.
• Character Stories – Treasure Hunter, Chef, Thief… each NPC steers you to a different ending.
• Endless Replayability – Random decks, alternate finales: every management term feels new.


LAUNCH DISCOUNT — NOW LIVE!
Limited-time offer for early mayors: swipe cards, grow your city, expand your town and rise as a legendary city leader. Download, govern and win today!

tw.description:
--

獲獎：
● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選
● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎
● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

遊戲特色：
● 地城+解謎+倉庫番
● 150 個精心設計的關卡
● 地城氛圍的像素美術
● 非線性地城地圖

--

Acrobits Groundwire: Elevate Your Communication

Acrobits, a leader in UCaaS and communication solutions for over 20 years, proudly introduces the Acrobits Groundwire softphone. This top-tier SIP softphone client offers unmatched voice and video call clarity. A softphone designed for both personal and professional use, it seamlessly integrates quality communication with an intuitive interface.

IMPORTANT, PLEASE READ

Groundwire is a SIP Client, not a VoIP service. You must have service with a VoIP provider or PBX that supports use on a standard SIP client to use it.

Choosing the Best Softphone App

Experience robust communication with a leading SIP softphone application. Preconfigured for major VoIP providers, this softphone app guarantees high-quality, secure, and intuitive calling. Perfect for maintaining connections with friends, family, and colleagues, maximizing all aspects of your VoIP experience.

Key Features of the SIP Softphone
- Exceptional Audio Quality: Enjoy crystal clear audio with support for multiple formats including Opus and G.729.
- HD Video Calls: Conduct up to 720p HD video calls, supported by H.264 and VP8.
- Robust Security: Our SIP softphone app ensures private conversations with military-grade encryption.
- Battery Efficiency: Thanks to our efficient push notifications, you can stay connected with minimal battery drain.
- Seamless Call Transition: Our VoIP dialer smoothly switches between WiFi and data plans during calls.
- Softphone Customization: Tailor your SIP settings, UI, and ringtones.
- 5G and Multi-Device Support: Ready for the future, compatible with most mobile operating systems.

Other features included on this robust app include: instant messaging, attended and unattended transfers, group calls, voicemail, and extensive customization for each SIP account. 

More Than Just a VoIP Softphone Dialer

Groundwire softphone offers more than the standard VoIP dialer experience. It’s a comprehensive tool for crystal clear Wi-Fi calling, equipped with robust business VoIP dialer features. It offers a secure and reliable softphone choice with no hidden fees and a one-time cost. Leverage SIP technology for improved call quality. Make this softphone your first choice for dependable, and easy SIP communication.

Download a feature-rich and modern SIP softphone now and be part of a community enjoying the best in voice and SIP calling. Transform your daily communication with our exceptional VoIP softphone app.

Take your VoIP calling experience to the next level with Acrobits Softphone with out-of-the-box support for many of the most popular providers and Bluetooth devices on the market.

Acrobits Softphone brings all the popular features you expect from a SIP app, including support for 5G, voice and video calling, push notifications, call handover between WiFi and data, multi-device compatibility, lifetime access to support and updates, and more.

Experience crystal clear calling with support for popular audio standards, including Opus, G.722, G.729, G.711, iLBC, and GSM. Need to make video calls? Acrobits Softphone supports up to 720p HD and supports both H.265 and VP8.

You can even create your own look and feel. Acrobits Softphone is fully customizable, allowing you to configure your own SIP call settings, UI, ringtones, and more.

Acrobits Softphone makes it easy for you to communicate with friends and family on any device. This SIP calling app is compatible with virtually all iPhones and iPads.

Don’t worry about hidden fees. You can try Acrobits Softphone today for a one-time fee that comes with lifetime support and updates.

这是一款沉浸于尼斯大陆史前史诗的冒险 MMORPG。远古之时，尼斯大陆本是完整陆块，一场剧烈的火山爆发将其分裂为萨伊纳斯、加鲁迦与吉鲁岛三大群岛，各岛气候迥异、地貌万千 —— 萨伊纳斯的温和村落、加鲁迦的热带丛林、吉鲁岛的神秘秘境，构成了这片充满生机与未知的土地。这里的人类部落以图腾为信仰，与栖息在道具、武器中的精灵共生，精灵们赋予人们勇气与力量，守护着部落的安宁。然而，曾经高度发达的机械文明因过度消耗自然，引发了毁灭性危机，光明精灵王为拯救生灵，封印了机械遗迹与黑暗精灵王，将大陆命名为 “尼斯”，让人类回归原始与自然共生的状态。如今，封印之力渐弱，黑暗气息悄然蔓延，图腾黯淡、巨兽狂躁，散落的晶石背后藏着拯救大陆的秘密，作为部落通过成人仪式的勇者，你将带着族人的期盼，穿越群岛丛林、洞窟迷宫，唤醒精灵之力，寻找晶石，抵御黑暗侵袭，续写尼斯大陆的存续传奇。

【游戏特色】

「福利丰厚・多重奖励领不停」
轻松起步，多重福利直接拉满！全服通关共同目标解锁集体福利；区服专属挑战达成后，全员瓜分资源礼包；每日签到福利不重样，累计登录还能解锁丰富资源助力快速成长，零门槛享受冒险乐趣。

「挂机成长・无限冒险不费力」
挂机战斗模式，解放双手也能热血升级！无论是探索原始森林、挑战野外巨兽，还是刷取材料副本，只需一键设置阵容，角色与宠物便自动作战，离线期间依旧能持续收获经验。随着等级攀升，不仅能解锁更广阔的原始地图，还能积累足够资源解锁更强技能、培养宠物，轻松从新手成长为部落强者。

「宠物捕捉养成・属性策略随心搭」
原始大陆藏着上百种萌趣与强悍并存的宠物，野外探索即可免费捕捉，运气爆棚还能邂逅稀有品种；想要快速解锁强力伙伴，也能通过召唤获取传说级宠物。宠物系统兼具趣味与策略，元素克制搭配、资质定向培养、技能自由组合，既能打造输出猛将，也能养成团队守护，专属宠物战力由你定义。

「多元玩法・热血不单调」
告别单一挂机，多样玩法覆盖不同需求！竞技场实时匹配同战力玩家，比拼宠物阵容与策略搭配，登顶榜单赢取稀有资源；狩猎玩法集结队友猎杀远古巨兽，获取顶级装备打造材料；副本分为单人试炼与组队挑战，难度梯度分明，新手与老手皆能找到乐趣；跨服活动每周开启，与其他区服玩家同台竞技，争夺专属奖励，热血对抗永不落幕。
在游戏中，你能轻松领满福利、挂机惬意成长，捕捉养成专属宠物，解锁多元热血玩法，和家族伙伴一起，探索原始大陆的无尽精彩与未知惊喜。

tw.description:
MagicKit AI – 全方位裝置與工具箱

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的實用工具應用程式，專為 iOS 設計，幫助您監控裝置狀態、優化效能，並透過單一介面輕鬆使用日常工具。功能齊全，兼顧隱私與電池續航。

裝置與系統工具：
• 電池狀態：查看目前電量與充電情況
• 儲存空間使用：分析已用與可用空間
• 裝置資訊：查看基本硬體與系統資訊
• 開機時間追蹤：監控裝置開機持續時間
• 電池小貼士：提供實用省電建議
• 相片清理：偵測與刪除重複或相似相片釋放空間

網路工具：
• 網速測試：測量網路連線速度
• Wi-Fi 資訊：查看網路名稱、IP 位址與連線狀態
• IP 查詢：查看公網 IP 的地理位置資訊

實用工具：
• 單位換算器：支援各類單位轉換
• 貨幣換算器：即時匯率與幣值轉換
• 日期時間計算器：支援工作日計算的日期差異
• 時區轉換器：全球時間轉換，支援夏令時間顯示
• 倒數計時與提醒：建立美觀倒數計時，支援提醒與重複事件
• Magic 計數器：追蹤多個計數器，提供統計與連續天數
• QR 掃描器：快速掃描二維碼
• 文件掃描器：高品質掃描與儲存文件
• 指南針與水平儀：使用裝置感應器測量方向與水平
• 螢幕方向鎖定：於應用內鎖定螢幕方向
• 音量測量儀：透過麥克風測量環境音量
• 剪貼簿管理器：管理當前應用中的複製內容
• 手電筒：開啟裝置手電筒照明
• 螢幕亮度調整：可於應用內直接調整亮度

特色亮點：
• 簡潔直覺的導引式介面
• 無廣告、無內購
• 輕巧省電
• 支援所有 iOS 裝置
• 持續新增工具與更新
• 重視隱私與效能

適用族群：
• 裝置監控與效能優化
• 日常測量與轉換任務
• 掃描文件與 QR 碼
• 相片清理與空間管理
• 倒數提醒與計劃管理
• 追蹤習慣與統計進度
• 快速使用工具如手電筒與亮度調整
• 執行簡易網路測試診斷

立即下載 MagicKit AI，使用一款智慧又強大的工具箱，簡化您的日常工作與生活！

- Now you can turn on Firts Person Mode (eye icon near healthbar)

tw.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

tw.description:
Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you’re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more!

Key Features:

Baseball Action Like Never Before:
Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter’s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun!

Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay:
Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops!

Collectible Doodle Characters:
Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments.

Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun:
Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action!

Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound:
Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run.

Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure.

Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

tw.description:
Organize your recipes. Create grocery lists. Plan your meals. Download recipes from your favorite websites. Seamlessly sync to all your devices.

Features

• Recipes - Download recipes from your favorite websites, or add your own.
• Grocery Lists - Create smart grocery lists that automatically combine ingredients and sort them by aisle.
• Pantry - Use the pantry to keep track of which ingredients you have and when they expire.
• Meal Planner - Plan your meals using our daily, weekly, or monthly calendars.
• Menus - Save your favorite meal plans as reusable menus.
• Sync - Keep your recipes, grocery lists, and meal plans synced between all your devices.

• Adjust - Scale ingredients to your desired serving size, and convert between measurements.
• Cook - Keep the screen on while cooking, cross off ingredients, and highlight your current step.
• Search - Organize your recipes into categories and subcategories. Search by name, ingredient, and more.
• Timers - Cook times are automatically detected in your directions. Simply tap on one to start a timer.

• Import - Import from existing apps such as MacGourmet, YummySoup!, MasterCook & Living Cookbook.
• Export - Export your meal plans to Calendar and your grocery lists to Reminders.
• Share - Share recipes via AirDrop or email.
• Print - Print recipes, grocery lists, menus, and meal plans. Recipes support multiple print formats including index cards.

• Extensions - Save recipes directly in Safari and view today's scheduled meals.
• Bookmarklet - Download recipes from any browser straight into your Paprika Cloud Sync account.
• Offline Access - All of your data is stored locally. No internet connection is required to view your recipes.

What's New in 3.0

• iPhone X and iOS 11 support. 
• iOS app is now universal.
• Multitasking support on iPad.
• Add multiple, full-sized photos to each recipe. Embed photos in your directions.
• Insert links to other recipes or websites in your ingredients or directions.
• Format recipes using bold and italics.
• Convert ingredient measurements between standard and metric.
• Search for recipes across multiple categories.
• Add custom aisles to your grocery list and re-arrange them in your preferred order.
• Create multiple grocery lists.
• Add custom ingredients to the pantry. Track quantities, purchase dates, and expiration dates.
• Move items back and forth between the pantry and grocery list.
• Add custom meal types to the meal planner.
• Create reusable menus that span multiple days.

Platforms

Paprika is available on multiple platforms so you can access it on all of your devices. Please note that each version is sold separately.

us.description:
RULE YOUR TOWN, BUILD YOUR CITY, BALANCE YOUR RESOURCES!
Swipe each card with one finger, become mayor, make bold decisions, please your people and carve your own reign into history!

Mayor Card fuses classic city-management simulation with lightning-fast swipe-card action to create a fresh strategy deck-builder. Drag every card left or right; collect taxes, protect nature, grow population and keep every resource bar alive. Let any gauge hit zero and you’re out of office—maintain the balance, win, and unlock new cards to build an even greater city.

KEY FEATURES

• 740 Unique Cards - 740 unique choices—every decision is yours!
• Swipe & Decide – Instant control, deep consequence.
• Triple Balance System – People, economy & nature; set tax rates, raise funds, stay green.
• Chain Cards – Risk-reward event chains; one move shapes the future.
• Adventure Cards – Call-Progress-Outcome stories; every deck hides new town legends.
• Character Stories – Treasure Hunter, Chef, Thief… each NPC steers you to a different ending.
• Endless Replayability – Random decks, alternate finales: every management term feels new.


LAUNCH DISCOUNT — NOW LIVE!
Limited-time offer for early mayors: swipe cards, grow your city, expand your town and rise as a legendary city leader. Download, govern and win today!

Awards:
● 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT: Official Selection
● Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual
● Bahamut 2020 ACG Creation Contest: Bronze Award

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

Features:
● Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban
● 150 handcrafted rooms
● Fantasy themed pixel art
● Non-linear dungeon map

us.description:
Acrobits Groundwire: Elevate Your Communication

Acrobits, a leader in UCaaS and communication solutions for over 20 years, proudly introduces the Acrobits Groundwire softphone. This top-tier SIP softphone client offers unmatched voice and video call clarity. A softphone designed for both personal and professional use, it seamlessly integrates quality communication with an intuitive interface.

IMPORTANT, PLEASE READ

Groundwire is a SIP Client, not a VoIP service. You must have service with a VoIP provider or PBX that supports use on a standard SIP client to use it.

Choosing the Best Softphone App

Experience robust communication with a leading SIP softphone application. Preconfigured for major VoIP providers, this softphone app guarantees high-quality, secure, and intuitive calling. Perfect for maintaining connections with friends, family, and colleagues, maximizing all aspects of your VoIP experience.

Key Features of the SIP Softphone
- Exceptional Audio Quality: Enjoy crystal clear audio with support for multiple formats including Opus and G.729.
- HD Video Calls: Conduct up to 720p HD video calls, supported by H.264 and VP8.
- Robust Security: Our SIP softphone app ensures private conversations with military-grade encryption.
- Battery Efficiency: Thanks to our efficient push notifications, you can stay connected with minimal battery drain.
- Seamless Call Transition: Our VoIP dialer smoothly switches between WiFi and data plans during calls.
- Softphone Customization: Tailor your SIP settings, UI, and ringtones.
- 5G and Multi-Device Support: Ready for the future, compatible with most mobile operating systems.

Other features included on this robust app include: instant messaging, attended and unattended transfers, group calls, voicemail, and extensive customization for each SIP account. 

More Than Just a VoIP Softphone Dialer

Groundwire softphone offers more than the standard VoIP dialer experience. It’s a comprehensive tool for crystal clear Wi-Fi calling, equipped with robust business VoIP dialer features. It offers a secure and reliable softphone choice with no hidden fees and a one-time cost. Leverage SIP technology for improved call quality. Make this softphone your first choice for dependable, and easy SIP communication.

Download a feature-rich and modern SIP softphone now and be part of a community enjoying the best in voice and SIP calling. Transform your daily communication with our exceptional VoIP softphone app.

Acrobits Softphone makes it easy for you to communicate with friends and family on any device. This SIP calling app is compatible with virtually all iPhones and iPads.

Don’t worry about hidden fees. You can try Acrobits Softphone today for a one-time fee that comes with lifetime support and updates.

us.description:
MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life.

Device and System Tools
• Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state
• Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage
• Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details
• Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running
• Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage
• Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space
• Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries
• RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance
• Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance

Network Tools
• Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed
• Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status
• IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses
• Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude

Security & Privacy Tools
• Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options
• Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases
• UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats
• Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options
• Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection

Utility Tools
• Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements
• Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies
• Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support
• Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status
• Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events
• Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks
• QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly
• Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition
• Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors
• Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app
• Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone
• Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session
• Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness
• Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup
• Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more
• Color Palettes Studio: Create, extract, and manage beautiful color palettes from images or manually using color pickers — perfect for designers and creatives

Highlights
• Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools
• Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities
• No ads or in-app purchases
• Lightweight and battery-efficient
• Compatible with all iOS devices
• Frequent updates with new tools
• Built with privacy and performance in mind
• Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations

Perfect for
• Device monitoring and optimization
• Everyday measurement and conversion tasks
• Scanning documents and QR codes
• Cleaning up photo storage and contacts
• Creating and managing countdowns with reminders
• Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters
• Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control
• Performing simple network diagnostics
• Generating secure passwords and managing privacy
• Taking quick notes and organizing information
• Designing and managing color palettes for creative projects

Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

us.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

tr.description:
After a devastating earthquake strikes Istanbul, can you find the woman you love?

In a fully hand-drawn Istanbul, embark on a journey that tests your instincts and hopes. After the earthquake, you must cross the city — from Bakırköy to Üsküdar — to find the woman you love.

Explore a hand-drawn, post-quake Istanbul — from shattered historic neighborhoods to the edge of the Bosphorus. Every corner hides new stories and challenges. In the heart of chaos, survival is not enough. You must do it without losing your honor.

On your journey to save your girlfriend, you’ll face not only physical obstacles but also emotional and psychological trials. The people you meet among the ruins—and their stories—will push you to make difficult moral choices.

To move forward, you’ll need to solve puzzles, crack safe codes, pick locks, explore devastated locations, and manage your energy wisely.

Quakeline is more than just a game; it is a project that aims to raise awareness about the possible impact of a real earthquake in Istanbul. Through its fictional yet grounded narrative, the game invites players to reflect on survival, resilience, and the human spirit.

Witness the struggle to survive—and the power of hope.
In this unforgettable journey, you’ll not only navigate through debris but also discover the deepest and purest parts of what it means to be human.

tr.description:
Organize your recipes. Create grocery lists. Plan your meals. Download recipes from your favorite websites. Seamlessly sync to all your devices.

pt.releaseNotes:
This update changes the behaviour of the loop button, making it consistent for single song and Setlist playback.  The loop button now has three modes:

* OFF: Plays a song from beginning to end. If the song is part of a setlist, it will automatically start the next song when the end of the current song is reached.
* LOOP: Plays between the start and end markers continuously in a loop.
* SECTION: Plays between the start and end markers once. If the song is part of a setlist, it will automatically move on to the next song when the end marker is reached.

Perfect Tempo will never interrupt you to ask for a review - we don’t like being interrupted either! However, App Store ratings and reviews are important, so if you are enjoying Perfect Tempo and have a spare minute, we’d be delighted if you could leave a rating or review on the App Store. Thanks!

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

● 150 handcrafted rooms
● Fantasy themed pixel art
● Non-linear dungeon map

	•	Dicas de Bateria: Receba conselhos úteis para melhorar o uso da bateria
	•	Limpeza de Fotos: Detecte e remova fotos duplicadas ou semelhantes
	•	Limpeza de Contatos: Organize contatos removendo duplicatas e entradas incompletas
	•	Gerenciador de RAM: Monitore o uso da memória e otimize o desempenho
	•	Teste de Benchmark: Avalie o desempenho de CPU, GPU, memória e rede

Ferramentas de Rede
	•	Teste de Velocidade: Meça a velocidade da conexão com a internet
	•	Informações do Wi-Fi: Veja nome da rede, IP e status da conexão
	•	Consulta de IP: Verifique a geolocalização de endereços IP públicos
	•	Informações de Localização: Acompanhe GPS, velocidade, direção e altitude

Segurança e Privacidade
	•	Gerador de Senhas: Crie senhas fortes e seguras com opções personalizáveis
	•	Gerador de Frases de Acesso: Crie frases memoráveis e seguras
	•	Gerador de UUID: Crie identificadores únicos em vários formatos
	•	Gerador de PIN Seguro: Gere códigos PIN seguros com várias opções
	•	E-mail Temporário: Crie e-mails descartáveis para proteger sua privacidade

Ferramentas Utilitárias
	•	Conversor de Unidades: Converta entre diferentes unidades de medida
	•	Conversor de Moeda e Cripto: Veja taxas de câmbio em tempo real para moedas e criptomoedas
	•	Calculadora de Datas: Calcule diferenças entre datas com suporte para dias úteis
	•	Conversor de Fuso Horário: Converta horários com atualizações ao vivo e suporte a horário de verão
	•	Contagem Regressiva e Lembretes: Crie contagens regressivas personalizadas com lembretes e eventos recorrentes
	•	Contador Mágico: Acompanhe múltiplos contadores com estatísticas e sequências
	•	Leitor de QR Code: Escaneie códigos QR instantaneamente
	•	Scanner de Documentos e Cartões: Capture e salve digitalizações com reconhecimento de texto via IA
	•	Bússola e Nível: Meça direção e nível usando os sensores do dispositivo
	•	Travar Orientação: Trave a orientação da tela ao usar o app
	•	Medidor de Áudio: Meça níveis de som ao redor com o microfone
	•	Gerenciador de Área de Transferência: Acesse e gerencie textos copiados durante a sessão
	•	Lanterna e Brilho: Ative a lanterna e ajuste o brilho da tela
	•	Bloco de Notas: Crie, organize e gerencie notas com categorias e backup no iCloud
	•	Gerador Universal: Gere dados aleatórios como texto, números, datas e mais

Destaques
	•	Interface limpa e fácil de usar com ferramentas assistidas
	•	Seção de Ferramentas em Destaque com as mais populares
	•	Sem anúncios ou compras no aplicativo
	•	Leve e eficiente no uso de bateria
	•	Compatível com todos os dispositivos iOS
	•	Atualizações frequentes com novas ferramentas
	•	Desenvolvido com foco em privacidade e desempenho
	•	Suporte para tema claro/escuro com animações suaves

Perfeito para:
	•	Monitorar e otimizar o dispositivo
	•	Medições e conversões do dia a dia
	•	Escanear documentos e QR Codes
	•	Limpar fotos e contatos duplicados
	•	Criar lembretes e contagens regressivas
	•	Acompanhar hábitos e progresso
	•	Acessar ferramentas rápidas como lanterna e brilho
	•	Diagnósticos básicos de rede
	•	Criar senhas seguras e manter a privacidade
	•	Tomar notas rápidas e organizadas

pt.releaseNotes:
We’ve made some awesome improvements to your baseball experience! Check out what’s new:

• Improved Graphics: Enjoy smoother visuals and a more polished look.
• New Doodle Characters: Build your team with fresh, quirky doodle players.
• New Bowling Styles: Try out exciting new ways to pitch and play.
• More Settings: Switch between portrait/landscape and fine-tune your sound.

Update now and step up to the plate with the best version yet!
pt.description:
Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you’re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more!

Key Features:

Baseball Action Like Never Before:
Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter’s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun!

Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay:
Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops!

Collectible Doodle Characters:
Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments.

Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun:
Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action!

Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound:
Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run.

Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure.

Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

pt.description:
Organize suas receitas. Crie listas de compras. Planeje suas refeições. Baixe receitas a partir dos seus sites favoritos. Sincronize com perfeição entre todos os seus dispositivos.

Recursos

• Receitas - Baixe receitas a partir dos seus sites favoritos ou adicione suas próprias receitas.
• Listas de Compras - Crie listas de compras inteligentes que combinam automaticamente ingredientes e os organizam por corredor do mercado.
• Despensa - Use a despensa para monitorar os ingredientes que você possui e as datas de validade deles.
• Planejador de Refeições - Planeje suas refeições usando nossos calendários diário, semanal ou mensal.
• Menus - Salve seus planos de refeições favoritos como menus reutilizáveis.
• Sincronização - Mantenha suas receitas, listas de compras e planos de refeições sincronizados entre todos os seus dispositivos.

• Ajuste - Dimensione os ingredientes para o tamanho de porção desejado e converta entre medidas.
• Cozinhe - Mantenha a tela ligada enquanto cozinha, marque ingredientes já utilizados e coloque em destaque a etapa atual.
• Pesquise - Organize suas receitas em categorias e subcategorias. Pesquise por nome, ingrediente e muito mais.
• Timers - Os tempos de preparo são detectados automaticamente nas suas instruções. Basta tocar em uma delas para iniciar um timer.

• Importe - Importe a partir de aplicativos existentes como MacGourmet, YummySoup!, MasterCook e Living Cookbook.
• Exporte - Exporte seus planos de refeições para o Calendário e suas listas de compras para os Lembretes.
• Compartilhe - Compartilhe receitas por AirDrop ou e-mail.
• Imprima - Imprima receitas, listas de compras, menus e planos de refeições. As receitas são compatíveis com diversos formatos de impressão, incluindo fichas.

• Extensões - Salve receitas diretamente no Safari e veja as refeições programadas do dia.
• Bookmarklet - Baixe receitas em qualquer navegador diretamente para a sua conta de Sincronização em Nuvem do Paprika.
• Acesso Offline - Todos os seus dados são armazenados localmente. Não é necessário conexão de internet para ver suas receitas.

Novidades da versão 3.0

• Suporte a iPhone X e iOS 11. 
• O aplicativo para iOS agora é universal.
• Suporte a multitarefa no iPad.
• Adicione diversas fotos em tamanho real para cada receita. Inclua fotos nas suas instruções.
• Insira links para outras receitas ou sites nos seus ingredientes ou instruções.
• Formate receitas usando negrito e itálico.
• Converta medidas de ingredientes entre padrão e métrico.
• Pesquise receitas em diversas categorias.
• Adicione corredores personalizados na sua lista de compras e reorganize na ordem desejada.
• Crie múltiplas listas de compras.
• Adicione ingredientes personalizados na despensa. Monitore quantidades, datas de compra e datas de validade.
• Mova itens entre a despensa e a lista de compras e vice-versa.
• Adicione tipos de refeições personalizados no planejador de refeições.
• Crie menus reutilizáveis que englobem diversos dias.

pt.releaseNotes:
Atualização 1.7: Sombras do Passado

Um fraco sinal de rádio de uma instalação há muito esquecida pode salvar o futuro da civilização. Mas, para chegar lá, os corajosos sobreviventes terão que se aventurar no coração mortal do velho mundo...

- Nova Campanha: Descubra um laboratório de pesquisa esquecido em meio às ruínas em 10 novos níveis
- Fronteiras Infestadas: Combata infestações distantes que assolam a região
- Civilização Expandida: Use Postos Avançados para impulsionar seu assentamento, além de novos edifícios, População e Níveis de Tecnologia
pt.description:
Você pode reconstruir a civilização após um apocalipse zumbi? Do criador de Plague Inc. vem uma mistura única de simulação estratégica, construção de cidades de sobrevivência e ‘mini 4X’.

Décadas após o Vírus Necroa devastar a humanidade, alguns sobreviventes emergem. Construa um assentamento, explore, colete recursos e expanda enquanto você molda sua sociedade pós-apocalíptica. O mundo está verde e bonito, mas o perigo espreita nas ruínas!

After Inc. é o novo jogo do criador de ‘Plague Inc.’ - um dos jogos mais populares de todos os tempos com mais de 190 milhões de jogadores. Brilhantemente executado com belos gráficos e jogabilidade aclamada pela crítica – After Inc. é envolvente e fácil de aprender. Construa múltiplos assentamentos e ganhe habilidades em uma campanha persistente para guiar a humanidade para fora da escuridão.

Anúncio de Serviço Público: Ao contrário de nossos outros jogos, estou feliz em dizer que After Inc. não é baseado em nenhuma situação real do mundo. Não há necessidade de começar a se preocupar com um apocalipse zumbi na vida real por enquanto...

◈◈◈ O que acontece depois de Plague Inc.? ◈◈◈

Características:
● Tome decisões difíceis - As crianças são um luxo inacessível? Cachorros são animais de estimação ou uma fonte de comida? Democracia ou Autoritarismo?
● Explore um Reino Unido pós-apocalíptico e belo
● Explore as ruínas do passado para coletar/colher recursos
● Expanda seu Assentamento com moradias, fazendas, madeireiras e muito mais
● Extermine infestações de zumbis e defenda a humanidade
● Descubra tecnologias antigas e pesquise novas
● Molde sua sociedade e forneça serviços para manter seu povo feliz
● Construa múltiplos assentamentos em uma campanha persistente e evolua habilidades
● Modelagem ultra-realista de comportamento de zumbis baseada em estudos reais… :P
● Algoritmos narrativos sofisticados moldados por suas decisões
● 5 líderes únicos com habilidades radicalmente diferentes
● Conexão com a internet não é necessária
● Sem microtransações 'consumíveis'. Pacotes de Expansão são 'compre uma vez, jogue para sempre'
● Será atualizado por muitos anos.

Preço especial de venda para celebrar o lançamento do jogo!
